title: Growing corn in garden organically | How-2-Do It Guide Step By Step | Best Guide

tasks.task: Tiller and seed process for corn cultivation
subtasks: Digging soil with a fork to make it uniform
Wearing hand gloves for safety
Moving soil using hands
Preparing organic fertilizer from animal dung
Mixing fertilizer and soil with a spade and fork
Breaking fertilizer pieces into fine powder
Elevating and preparing a rectangular plateau for sowing
Sowing corn seeds at the appropriate depth and spacing
Watering the sown seeds thoroughly
Waiting for 7-10 days for corn sprouts to appear
Soaking corn seeds in water for 3-4 hours
Breaking down organic fertilizer into powder form
Removing stones or concrete fragments from the fertilizer
Mixing soil and fertilizer with hands
Breaking down sand blocks in fertilizer
Creating an elevated rectangular plateau
Ensuring the plateau height is above 10 cm
Placing seeds at a depth of 1 inch
Ensuring seeds are spaced 15-20 cm apart
Watering the sown area thoroughly after sowing
